//ori  $2,$0,2
01000000000000100000000000000010
//add  $3,$2,$1
00000000010000010001100000000000
//sub  $5,$3,$2
00001000011000100010100000000000
//and  $4,$5,$2
01000100101000100010000000000000
//or  $8,$4,$2
01001000100000100100000000000000
//sll  $8,$8,1
01100000000010000100000001000000
//bne  $8,$1,-2 (≠,转18)
11000101000000011111111111111110
//slti  $6,$2,8
01101100010001100000000000001000
//slti  $7,$6,0
01101100110001110000000000000000
//addi $7,$7,8
00000100111001110000000000001000
//beq $7,$1,-2 (=,转28)
11000000111000011111111111111110

10011000001000100000000000000100
//lw  $9,4($1)
10011100001010010000000000000100
